Chicken Sandwich

Ingredients

  • 2 eggs
  • 2 tbsp mayonnaise
  • 3 slices bread
  • a little butter
  • ⅓ carton of cress
  • 2-3 slices of tomato or a lettuce leaf and a slice of ham or cheese
  • crisps , to serve
